blueprint.description: Installs Proton on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Proton](https://www.proton.org/) is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. Proton is released under GPLv3+ license and is available for Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.
blueprint.name: Proton
blueprint.title: Proton
